title: Pride
description: Jess and her all-female pride would be fine if random male lions didn't feel the need to come to town to try to take over.Until the Amakhosi, the king of the lions, pays them a visit. This isn't a romance. Pride is unapologetic erotica, and the Amakhosi's only rules are the ones he makes up.Oh, and cats have spiked penises.
author: Candace Blevins
